stack
Interface Stack

All Known Implementing Classes:
StackArray, StackList
public interface Stack

An interface for stack implementation, based on the reading materials from Prof. Dr. Debora Weber-Wulff http://www.f4.fhtw-berlin.de/~weberwu/info2/Handouts/StackImpl.java

Author:
Tobias Preuss (s0516424) & Niels Richter (s0517512)

Method Summary
 void Empty()
          Emptys the stack for reinitialization
 boolean isEmpty()
          Checks if the stack is empty
 void pop()
          Pop an object out of the stack
 java.lang.String print()
          Generates a string to print the stack out
 void push(java.lang.Object o)
          Push an object into the stack
 java.lang.Object top()
          Return the latest element out of the stack
